document_data.name: Vine Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Vine Street''' was a road in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It lay in the western part of Loudwater.<ref group="note">This is assumed from the similar names and the nature of the traffic.
document_data.Description: It was a major thoroughfare, taking over from Pool's Way where it turned toward the docks and receiving much traffic of pedestrians, [[horse]]s, and wagons. It was dense with the shops that attracted them.
